comments:
Eclipse 3.2M6 
The following error occurs if "useHashLookup" is set to false.

Caused by: java.lang.StackOverflowError
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.viewers.AsynchronousViewer.doFindInputItem(AsynchronousViewer.java:440)
at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredViewer.findItems(StructuredViewer.java:754)

Async viewers are required to use hash lookup. We shold not let subclasses change this.
Fixed in AsynchronousViewer by making #setUseHashLookup final and only accepting "true".
